entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind becoming west 30 km/h overnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 9:25 PM MDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 30 km/h becoming southwest 50 gusting to 70 near noon. High 7. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 9:25 PM MDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Periods of snow near the British Columbia border overnight. Amount 5 cm near the British Columbia border. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 60 in the evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 9:25 PM MDT Sunday 12 March 2023
